org.eclipse.january.dataset

Interface IMetadataProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CompoundDataset, Dataset, DateDataset, IDataset, IDynamicDataset, ILazyDataset, ILazyWriteableDataset
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCompoundDataset, AbstractDataset, AggregateDataset, BooleanDataset, BooleanDatasetBase, ByteDataset, ComplexDoubleDataset, ComplexFloatDataset, CompoundByteDataset, CompoundDoubleDataset, CompoundFloatDataset, CompoundIntegerDataset, CompoundLongDataset, CompoundShortDataset, DateDatasetImpl, DoubleDataset, FloatDataset, IntegerDataset, LazyDataset, LazyDatasetBase, LazyDynamicDataset, LazyWriteableDataset, LongDataset, ObjectDataset, ObjectDatasetBase, RGBDataset, ShortDataset, StringDataset, StringDatasetBase

    public interface IMetadataProvider
    Interface which acts to provide metadata from an object
